title.rendered: Get up to 50% on summer 2019 to beautiful destinations across Europe and Winter fares to Ireland and Europe in Aer Lingus Airlines

content.rendered:
January sale now on!

Get up to 50% on summer 2019 flights to beautiful destinations across Europe. Or why not get a deal to New York, Boston and more great North American destinations from only €189 each way, as part of a return trip.

Travel: 01 May until 30 September 2019

For more details visit : https://www.aerlingus.com/plan-and-book/latest-offers/flights-from-ireland/flights-from-ireland-to-europe/

North America from only €189

Fly direct to North America from only €189 each way, as part of a return trip. Don’t miss out!

Travel: 01 April – 31 October 2019**

For more details visit : https://www.aerlingus.com/plan-and-book/latest-offers/flights-from-ireland/flights-from-ireland-to-north-america/

Terms and Conditions
Discount applies to fares before taxes and charges. Where the base fare is zero, no discount can apply to the zero fare. Discount does not apply to infant fares. Discount varies depending on route and class. Travel between 01 May and 30 September 2019. Book by 15 January 2019. All prices are subject to terms and conditions and are subject to availability. Limited availability during holidays and special events.

USA to Ireland

Get $150 Off on Vacations from USA to Ireland

Save $150* per person when you book an air inclusive package for travel in 2019 to Ireland, Scotland, Spain and many other destinations.

Use Promo code: GO2019 by 01/11/19

Winter fares to Ireland

Travel between : January 8 to March 31, 2019

For more details visit :https://www.aerlingus.com/plan-and-book/latest-offers/flights-from-usa/flights-from-usa-to-ireland/#/tab-1-winter-fares

Belfast to Heathrow

Book flights today and fly from Belfast to Heathrow from only £39.99.

Travel: until 15 April 2019

Terms and Conditions
Fares are one-way including taxes, charges and admin fee, and are available for travel until 15 April 2019. Subject to terms, conditions and availability. Weekend supplement may apply. Limited availability during holiday and other peak travel periods including Bank Holidays, school holidays and sporting events.

Winter fares to Europe

Travel January 13 to March 31, 2019

For more details visit : https://www.aerlingus.com/plan-and-book/latest-offers/flights-from-canada/flights-from-canada-to-europe/

View other offers here

To book tickets click here
